items.name: j_menu
items.jade:
.row
    /////////header/////////
    .menu
      nav
        .col.l2.s7.logo
          img.responsive-img.col.l8.s12(src='img/ph.jpg') 
        .col.l6.menu
          a.sidenav-trigger(href='#', data-target='mobile-menu')
            i.material-icons menu
          ul#nav-mobile.left.hide-on-med-and-down
            li
              a(href='') home
            li
              a(href='') about
            li
              a(href='') projects
            li
              a(href='') blog
            li
              a(href='') contact us
          ul#mobile-menu.sidenav
            li
              a(href='') home
            li
              a(href='') about
            li
              a(href='') projects
            li
              a(href='') blog
            li
              a(href='') contact us 
      
  /////////end header/////////
items.html:
menu
  • home
  • about
  • projects
  • blog
  • contact us
  • home
  • about
  • projects
  • blog
  • contact us

items.name: jlogomenu
items.jade:
.row
    /////////header/////////
  
    .col.s12.center.ylogo.mb30
      img.responsive-img.col.l4(src="img/ph.jpg")  
    .col.s12
      nav.blue.darken-4
        .nav-wrapper
          .col.l4
            a.sidenav-trigger(href='#', data-target='mobile-menu')
              i.material-icons menu
          ul#nav-mobile.left.hide-on-med-and-down
            li
              a(href='') home
            li
              a(href='') about
            li
              a(href='') projects
            li
              a(href='') contact us
          ul#mobile-menu.sidenav
            li
              a(href='') home
            li
              a(href='') about
            li
              a(href='') projects
            li
              a(href='') contact us  
      // end navbar

items.name: jbrands
jprice_tables
items.jade:
//////jprice_table//////
  .row.jprice_table
    - for (var x = 0; x < 3; x++)
      .col.s12.l4
        .card
          .card-content.center
            h5 Free          
          .card-content.center
            h2.green-text
              small $0
          ul.collection.center
            li.collection-item
              strong feature1           
            li.collection-item
              strong feature2           
            li.collection-item
              strong feature3           
          .card-content.center
            .row
              .col.s12
                button.btn.green buy now
  /////end jprice_table////

items.name: jacontactform
items.jade:
//////contact_us//////
  .row#contact_us
    .col.s12.l10.offset-l1.white.contact_container
      h2 contact form
      form(method="POST",action="https://formspree.io/your@email.com")
        .row
          .input-field.col.s6
            input#first_name.validate(type='text', name='fname')
            label.active(for='first_name') First Name
          .input-field.col.s6
            input#last_name(type='text', name='lname')
            label(for='last_name') Last Name
        .row
          .input-field.col.s12
            input#email.validate(type='email', name='mail')
            label(for='email') Email
        .row
          .input-field.col.s12
            textarea#messge.materialize-textarea(name='msg')
            label(for='messge') messge
        .row
          input.waves-effect.waves-light.btn.ybtn.cyan.col.l4(type='submit', value='Send')
  ///////////end contact form //////////
items.html: contact form

items.name: j_footer
items.jade:
///////footer//////
footer.page-footer
  .container
    .row
      - for (var x = 0; x < 3; x++)
        .col.l4.s12.center
          h5.white-text Links
          ul
            li
              a.grey-text.text-lighten-3(href='#!') Link 1
            li
              a.grey-text.text-lighten-3(href='#!') Link 2
            li
              a.grey-text.text-lighten-3(href='#!') Link 3
            li
              a.grey-text.text-lighten-3(href='#!') Link 4
  .footer-copyright
    .container.center
      span © 2019 Copyright Text
      
//////////////end footer//////////////

Links
  • Link 1
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
  • Link 4
